Dashboard

How to change member roles?
There are 3 member roles: owner, admin, and member. Owners and admins can switch the role of any user between an admin and member. Members cannot make any updates. Only the owner can set a new owner. To change the role of any member, follow these steps:

How to change a default notification email?
A default notification email is the same email that was used by the person who created the workspace. You can change this email to anything at any time.

How to add a new workspace?
On the servers list, above all of the servers, click on the current workspace and in the workspace tab you will find the drop-down to switch to another workspace or create a new one.

How to add a new member to the workspace?
Workspaces may have from 1 to 30 members. To add a new member you must have an admin role or owner role and you will need to add the person’s email. After adding the new member, she or he will get an invitation email with relevant details such as the workspace name and the inviter. If an email is not registered with Trafikito as yet, the user will be created and an invitation email will include a randomly generated password. To add a new member, follow these steps:

How to activate/deactivate a member from the workspace?
Only active members can login to the workspace. Owners cannot be deactivated. To deactivate a member from the active workspace, follow these steps:

How does the loyalty program work?
The loyalty program allows you to save money on paid plans; especially for users who use Trafikito for an extended period of time. Also, it is permanent and can be added to other discounts. The maximum sum of all discounts is 50%.

How can I get my invoice?
You can generate a new invoice that's due or get already paid invoices at the pricing tab in the workspace configuration dialog. Follow these steps to find an invoice:

How can I get a discount coupon?
There is no one way to get a discount coupon. We release from time to time in different ways. During special events or random days that we may announce giveaways on our dashboard or homepage. Sometimes you can find them online on other websites. When you see a coupon code, act quickly because most of the time it’s temporary.

Can not login to the workspace
If you are not an owner of the workspace, you have to be an active member of it. Ask someone from the workspace with an admin or owner role to activate your membership.

Can I use Trafikito for free?
Yes. Trafikito has a great free plan orientated to individuals or one-person companies. The Free plan will provide you with a great 1-minute log interval, 24 hours visibility, notifications and all unique features that separate Trafikito from others. You can monitor the output of any command and make custom API calls on events with the free plan. If you like it, please help Trafikito grow by sharing it with your friends and colleagues.

Trafikito Goal

The main goal is to make a stable tool which provides information in a new way for free, for everyone and with smart defaults yet powerful configurable options.
